      • start

        public void start(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
           throws java.lang.Exception
        Initializes all of the values. The School database is read from an internal file "src/data/SchoolDatabase.mer." The other two StudentLists are emtpy if the backup file does not exist, other they are populated with the backup file's data. The data itself is stored in a HashMap of Strings and StudentLists.
        Specified by:
        start in class javafx.application.Application
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • showOptionsPage

        public void showOptionsPage()
        Shows the settings page.

      • hideOptionsPage

        public void hideOptionsPage()
        Hides the settings page.

      • readStudentDatabase

        public StudentList readStudentDatabase(java.lang.String fileName,
                                       java.lang.String opt)
        Reads from a mer file. A Mer file is a .csv with an extra row on the top for headers. No spaces are in between elements of the .csv. If there is an error, a pop-up window that displays an eroor is displayed.
        Parameters:
        fileName - The file path of the mer.
        opt - whcih type of data it ise (database, sign in, or signout)
        Returns:
        Returns a StudentList of students in the data file.
